getCurrentTimeStamp

getRowNumber

public int getRowNumber(long time,
                        int numberOfRows)
This method returns the row number one should read at a given time. The returned number is between 0 and numberOfRows. It is based on the same validation and method as in getTimeStamp().

Parameters:
time - the actual time.
numberOfRows - The number of rows in the data file (1000 for Nice demo).
Returns:
a number between 0 and numberOfRows.
